speaker: HOSTESS
text: Prithee, honey-sweet husband, let me bring

speaker: HOSTESS
text: thee to Staines.

speaker: PISTOL
text: No; for my manly heart doth earn.—Bardolph,

speaker: PISTOL
text: be blithe.—Nym, rouse thy vaunting veins.— Boy,

speaker: PISTOL
text: bristle thy courage up. For Falstaff, he is dead, and

speaker: PISTOL
text: we must earn therefore.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Would I were with him, wheresome’er he

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: is, either in heaven or in hell.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Nay, sure, he’s not in hell! He’s in Arthur’s

speaker: HOSTESS
text: bosom, if ever man went to Arthur’s bosom. He

speaker: HOSTESS
text: made a finer end, and went away an it had been any

speaker: HOSTESS
text: christom child. He parted ev’n just between twelve

speaker: HOSTESS
text: and one, ev’n at the turning o’ th’ tide; for after I saw

speaker: HOSTESS
text: him fumble with the sheets and play with flowers

speaker: HOSTESS
text: and smile upon his finger’s end, I knew there was

speaker: HOSTESS
text: but one way, for his nose was as sharp as a pen and

speaker: HOSTESS
text: he talked of green fields. “How now, Sir John?”

speaker: HOSTESS
text: quoth I. “What, man, be o’ good cheer!” So he cried

speaker: HOSTESS
text: out “God, God, God!” three or four times. Now I, to

speaker: HOSTESS
text: comfort him, bid him he should not think of God; I

speaker: HOSTESS
text: hoped there was no need to trouble himself with

speaker: HOSTESS
text: any such thoughts yet. So he bade me lay more

speaker: HOSTESS
text: clothes on his feet. I put my hand into the bed and

speaker: HOSTESS
text: felt them, and they were as cold as any stone. Then I

speaker: HOSTESS
text: felt to his knees, and so upward and upward, and

speaker: HOSTESS
text: all was as cold as any stone.

speaker: NYM
text: They say he cried out of sack.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Ay, that he did.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: And of women.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Nay, that he did not.

speaker: BOY
text: Yes, that he did, and said they were devils

speaker: BOY
text: incarnate.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: He could never abide carnation. ’Twas a

speaker: HOSTESS
text: color he never liked.

speaker: BOY
text: He said once, the devil would have him about

speaker: BOY
text: women.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: He did in some sort, indeed, handle women,

speaker: HOSTESS
text: but then he was rheumatic and talked of the Whore

speaker: HOSTESS
text: of Babylon.

speaker: BOY
text: Do you not remember he saw a flea stick upon

speaker: BOY
text: Bardolph’s nose, and he said it was a black soul

speaker: BOY
text: burning in hell?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Well, the fuel is gone that maintained that

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: fire. That’s all the riches I got in his service.

speaker: NYM
text: Shall we shog? The King will be gone from

speaker: NYM
text: Southampton.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Come, let’s away.—My love, give me thy lips.

speaker: PISTOL
text:
They
                 
                kiss
                .
               Look to my chattels and my movables.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Let senses rule. The word is “Pitch and pay.” Trust

speaker: PISTOL
text: none, for oaths are straws, men’s faiths are wafer-cakes,

speaker: PISTOL
text: and Holdfast is the only dog, my duck.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Therefore, Caveto be thy counselor. Go, clear thy

speaker: PISTOL
text: crystals.—Yoke-fellows in arms, let us to France,

speaker: PISTOL
text: like horse-leeches, my boys, to suck, to suck, the

speaker: PISTOL
text: very blood to suck.

speaker: BOY
text: And that’s but unwholesome food, they say.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Touch her soft mouth, and march.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Farewell, hostess.

speaker: NYM
text: I cannot kiss, that is the humor of it. But adieu.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Let huswifery appear. Keep

speaker: PISTOL
text: close, I thee command.

speaker: HOSTESS
text: Farewell. Adieu.
